property.name: Array
property.description: Name of the Storage Array.

property.name: Storage Group Name
property.description: Name of the Storage Group.

property.name: # Devices
property.description: Number of Devices in the Storage Group.

property.name: Presented Capacity - Current
property.description: Total Capacity of the Storage Group.

property.name: Used Capacity - Current
property.description: Total Used Capacity of the Storage Group.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 30 Days
property.description: Delta between previous (x) day metric (Last 1 day metric of the last day on the month/quarter/6 months) and the current Presented/Used metric.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 90 Days
property.description: Delta between previous (x) day metric (Last 1 day metric of the last day on the month/quarter/6 months) and the current Presented/Used metric.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 180 Days
property.description: Delta between previous (x) day metric (Last 1 day metric of the last day on the month/quarter/6 months) and the current Presented/Used metric.

property.name: Storage Group
property.description: Storage Group name.

property.name: LUN Name
property.description: LUN name.

property.name: LUN ID
property.description: LUN identifier.

property.name: RAID Level
property.description: RAID type.

property.name: Disk Technology
property.description: Indicates the disk technology used.

property.name: Purpose
property.description: The purpose of the LUN.The LUN is used as Local Replica or Pool contributor etc.

property.name: Thin / Thick
property.description: Type of Storage Provisioning i.e. (Thin/Thick).

property.name: Storage Pool / RAID Group
property.description: Storage Pool / RAID Group name.

property.name: Storage Pool / RAID Group Type
property.description: Storage Pool / RAID Group type.

property.name: Service Level
property.description: Service level name.

property.name: Capacity (GB)
property.description: The total capacity of the LUN.

property.name: Used Capacity (GB)
property.description: The consumed capacity of the LUN.

property.displayedProperties: part[Name] dgraid[RAID level] dgstype[LUN Type] csupoltp[Consuming from Storage Pool / RAID Group] csupolnm[Consuming from Storage Pool #/ RAID Group #]

property.name: Host
property.description: Name of the Host.

property.name: Host Type
property.description: Type of host; values can be - Host, Hypervisor, PassiveHost

property.name: Resolved IP
property.description: The IP address of the host.

property.name: Presented - Current
property.description: Current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Used Capacity - Current
property.description: Current sum of Primary Presented Used Capacity of all the host disks. It is deduplicated by shared capacity.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 30 Days
property.description: Delta between previous 30 day sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity and the current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 90 Days
property.description: Delta between previous 90 day sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity and the current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity.

property.name: Presented Delta - Last 180 Days
property.description: Delta between previous 180 day sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity and the current sum of Primary Presented Chargeable Capacity.

property.name: Last Timestamp
property.description: The most recent date/time that this key performance indicator has been collected.
